base \( \sin x \) line The [[eigenvalue]]s of the matrix '''''A''''' are \(\scriptstyle \varphi=\frac12(1+\sqrt5)\,\!\) and \(\scriptstyle 1-\varphi=\frac12(1-\sqrt5)\), for the respective [[eigenvector]]s \(\scriptstyle {\varphi \choose 1}\) and \(\scriptstyle {1-\varphi \choose 1}\) . Since \(\scriptstyle {\varphi \choose 1} - \scriptstyle {1-\varphi \choose 1}= \sqrt{5} ~\scriptstyle {1\choose 0}\), and \(\vec F_{n} = \mathbf{A}^n \vec F_{0},\) the above closed-form expression for the {{mvar|n}}th element in the Fibonacci series as an [[analytic function]] of {{mvar|n}} is now read off directly, :\[ F_{n} = \cfrac{1}{\sqrt{5}}\cdot\left(\cfrac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2}\right)^n-\cfrac{1}{\sqrt{5}}\cdot\left(\cfrac{1-\sqrt{5}}{2}\right)^n~.\]
